messages.subject: Tsuba ; need yr help for identification
messages.msgSnippet: I recently got a tsuba ( see pictures in album MCU, tsuba 1 and tsuba 1 detail) : dia 69mm, thickness 5,5mm at the rim and 4,5mm at the seppa dai I will
messages.messageBody:
I recently got a tsuba ( see pictures in album MCU, tsuba 1 and tsuba 1 detail) : dia 69mm, thickness 5,5mm at the rim and 4,5mm at the seppa dai
I will tentatively say it looks like pre-edo or early edo ; the small diameter is probably a useful characteristic - I have seen the names Owari or Kanamaya but i lack experience to go further.

Any idea to help?

Thanks

michel
